trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There were no other sightings in San Jose on or around February 15th 2011
Summary: in the late afternoon i observed a very large black smoke ring
divs: sighting detailsi was traveling north on monterey rd. approx. 1 mile from cottle blvd. i was driving and being new to the area i was looking around as i drove when i noticed a large black ring very sooty and dark. it was about fifty feet off the ground and 1\4 mile away to my left directly over a residential neighborhood. it was completely still not rising or visibly dissipating. however it did look like it was starting to come apart with wispy tendrils stretching upwards. once i saw it i was fascinated i watched it until traffic forced me to pay more attention to the road then was blocked by large trees as i continued on. i didnt have a camera but i could sketch what i saw.
